name: WebGravity
tag_list: webgravity, web-gravity, seo, e-commerce-development, ciesnik, dynamic-websites
overview:
WebGravity provides e-commerce/SaaS development and integration, digital media production, web services, software development, graphic design, and search engine optimization services to small- and medium sized businesses across the United States.

WebGravity offers complete end-to-end web and content management solutions for a multitude of industries from leisure/tourism to medical to legal industries. Services in the “Complete Web Solutions” section range from web design to content development to high availability deployments.

WebGravity offers Software as a Service, e-commerce services, web hosting, web-page building tools and services, catalog building, multimedia presentations, and website promotion services.

WebGravity specializes in SEO and promotion services, from campaign design, creative content creation, to full deployment of large online marketing programs. Services include Organic Search Engine Optimization (Organic SEO), keyword research, content analysis and on-page optimization, SEO copywriting, HTML code optimization, PPC Management, Web 2.0 & Social Media Optimization.
